short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the news you care about from the publishers you love

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your morning newspaper with the Searching Extension. Access the news you care about from the publishers you love with every search. Stop juggling among different news apps to get the top stories that matter to you. When you install the Searching Extension, you’ll see the news you care about and your live local weather on the right side of the screen with every search. Never let a trending news story pass you by again.

The Chrome Extension will change your default search engine to Searching.am.

Important
By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Searching.am extension and setting my default search to that provided by the service, the Privacy Policy, and the Terms of Use.

How does it work?

1. The extension configures your browser’s default search engine to Searching.am
2. Search for any content through your address bar
3. You’ll see the news you care about and your live local weather on the right side of the screen.

Privacy Policy: https://searching.am/privacy

Terms of Service: https://searching.am/terms

Contact us by email at searchingext@gmail.com

We hope that you enjoy our extension and it improves your internet experience. We welcome any feedback you have.
